files.patch:
@@ -329,1 +329,3 @@
-    if [[ -d "/$firstdir" ]];  then
+    # and the prefix is not a subdirectory in the current working directory. Remove
+    # any part leading up to a : or = in the prefix before checking.
+    if [[ -d "/$firstdir" && ! -d "${prefix##*:}" && ! -d "${prefix##*=}" ]];  then
